title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2268/97 of 14 November 1997 adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
header:
15.11.1997 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 313/1
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2268/97
of 14 November 1997
adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The maximum annual fishing effort for the Kingdom of the Netherlands in respect of demersal species using towed gear, as referred to in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 2027/95, is amended as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 November 1997.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ L 199, 24. 8. 1995, p. 1.
(2)  OJ L 71, 31. 3. 1995, p. 5.
(3)  OJ L 66, 6. 3. 1997, p. 1.
(4)  OJ L 278, 11. 10. 1997, p. 1.

(1)  Expressed in thousands of kW x fishing days.
(2)  Area defined in Article 3 (5) of Regulation (EC) No 685/95. The fishing effort for this area is for both towed and fixed gear.
(3)  Except for waters under the sovereignty/jurisdiction of the Faroes and Iceland.
(4)  North of 50° 30' N.
(5)  Solely in waters under the sovereignty/jurisdiction of Spain.
(6)  Solely in waters under the sovereignty/jurisdiction of Portugal.’
